version_description:
In this release, we offer you something special!
Now, every 4 hours a chest fills with a mysterious surprise that will be waiting for you. Go and check what is inside this time.
You can also monitor your progress in the game, as we show you the best score at a given level. You can check this while selecting the game level with the computer.
Moreover, from now on you can visit the settings from the gameplay.

In this release, we offer you something special!
Now, every 4 hours a chest fills with a mysterious surprise that will be waiting for you. Go and check what is inside this time.
You can also monitor your progress in the game, as we show you the best score at a given level. You can check this while selecting the game level with the computer.
Moreover, from now on you can visit the settings from the gameplay.

We have a unique offer for new players. Check out our Starter pack!
Moreover, to make our Chess even better, we have improved its stability.
Now on you can also play in Norwegian.
Spill og bli en mester!
